name: 25 Years of Regency of Oscar II
obverse: Bust of Oscar II facing left.
reverse: A coat of arms with two sections: the top has a Saint George's cross, the bottom has the Swedish lion resting its right paw on a Saint George's cross. A helmet rests on the top of the coat of arms. Two knights with spears are holding the coat of arms.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 25th year of King Oscar II's reign.
